p: In addition to previously described mechanisms of protection for HA-Abs, indirect antiviral FcR-mediated effector functions like ADCC, antibody-dependent cellular phagocytosis (ADCP) and complement mediated cell-cytotoxicity (CDCC) have been described both in humans and mice ( 83â€“ 92). Also, ADCC has been described for NA-Abs ( 87). Although, these mechanisms of protection will not be addressed further in this article, these effector antiviral function of HA- and NA-Abs may have an important role on protection against IAV infection.
